posts.message:
Html Game build in the last weekend
use Font-Awesome 3 , Animate.css  , normalize.css
sure jQuery  and compile my java script with closure-compiler

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.havebreak.matchcolor

Ever wondered how assign  a probabilistic weight to an event? E.g. Make an item produce a critical strike 10% of the time or making a certain reward 50% more likely to pop up than others.

Quite frankly I never thought it is that simple! It really fascinated me

posts.message:
كيلو جرام = 1000 جرام
ميجا هيرتز = 1000 كيلو هرتز
جيجا هيرتز = 1000 ميجا هيرتز
ميجا بيت = 1024 كيلو بيت
جيجا بيت= 1024 ميجا بيت
تيرا بيت = 1024 جيجا بيت
واشترى هارد تيرا بيت الى المفروض يكون 1024 جيجا مش محصل 940 جيجا :(
Don't know if any one posted this here before  :D

posts.message:
I've never setup a Virtual Private Server out in the open on the Internet, and I was wondering how safe it would be?
I prefer Windows, because it's what I know.
It's intended to run all kinds of applications, blog, CMS, Wiki, file sync, photo storage, etc.
From your experience, what safety/security steps I need to pay attention to?
Does the security of the server depend on the applications or the OS, or both?
I can't think of any helpful idea for my graduation project, any help?
